result.name: personal_consumer_debt_-_county_court_judgements_ccjs
result.notes:
Information on the total amount of debt has been complemented by details on the overall number of County Court Judgments (CCJs) together with supplementary breakdowns by amount.
Source: Registry Trust Ltd (RTL)
Publisher: Neighbourhood Statistics
Geographies: Middle Layer Super Output Area (MSOA), Local Authority District (LAD), Government Office Region (GOR), National
Geographic coverage: England and Wales
Time coverage: 2003 to 2005
Type of data: Administrative data
Notes: In all cases the figures refer to judgments taken out against individuals for outstanding personal debts of 1pound or more.

odi-certificate.title: Personal consumer debt - County Court Judgements (CCJs)

organization.name: office-for-national-statistics
organization.title: Office for National Statistics
organization.description:
The Office for National Statistics (ONS) is the UK’s largest independent producer of official statistics and is the recognised national statistical institute for the UK. It is responsible for collecting and publishing statistics related to the economy, population and society at national, regional and local levels. It also conducts the census in England and Wales every ten years. 

The ONS plays a leading role in national and international good practice in the production of official statistics. It is the executive office of the UK Statistics Authority and although they are separate, they are still closely related.

result.precision: #The register refers to individual CCJ records rather than to persons or households. As a result it is possible that several CCJs may have been recorded against the same person during the period under review. Similarly, it is possible that a single CCJ may be taken out against more than one person where the debt is considered to be a joint or shared responsibility.#Debts relating to individual businesses or commercial concerns have been excluded from this dataset.#Every effort has been made by the RTL to ensure that these data do not allow the identification of individuals. To protect confidentiality, cells with low counts or dominant contributors have been suppressed.
result.title: Personal consumer debt - County Court Judgements (CCJs)
